definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Inside walls painted figures have landscape murals , painted exquisite skills.
sentences.chinese: 殿內四壁繪有人物山水壁畫，繪技精湛。

sentences.english: Inside "Buddha Chuan mural, " What is even more amazed.
sentences.chinese: 殿內“佛傳壁畫”，更令人讚歎不已。

sentences.english: Danapati Bodhisattva, Tang dynasty, cave fresco, cave 401, Mogao grottoes, Dunhuang.
sentences.chinese: 供養菩薩，唐，石窟壁畫，敦煌莫高窟第401窟。

sentences.english: My wall-painting mission continues, and last weekend there was a long story full of twists and turns.
sentences.chinese: 上個週末的壁畫工程又是一段充滿轉折的故事。

sentences.english: On the ground floor some old murals have survived.
sentences.chinese: 在底層，有一些古舊的壁畫。

sentences.english: Another homage to music legends - this time the Beatles.
sentences.chinese: 這幅壁畫是獻給甲殼蟲樂隊的傳奇音樂人的。

sentences.english: Dunhuang Grottoes is a history showing with image, including abundant subjects.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌石窟壁畫藝術包羅萬象，是一部形象的歷史。

sentences.english: The frescos in the Sistine Chapel are world-famous.
sentences.chinese: 西斯廷教堂的壁畫舉世聞名。

sentences.english: You can see the evolution process from Frescoes to oil painting in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 在意大利可以看到繪畫從溼壁畫到油畫的發展過程。

sentences.english: In some grottoes, there are as many as three mural layers.
sentences.chinese: 有些洞窟中，壁畫疊壓達三層之多。

sentences.english: The holy trinity is located in the center and is surrounded by apostles and saints.
sentences.chinese: 三位一體位於壁畫中央，十二門徒和諸聖分列四周。

sentences.english: Tempera was used to paint frescos hundreds of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 數世紀前蛋彩畫顏料被用來畫壁畫。

sentences.english: As in the gold mosaic of a wall.
sentences.chinese: 好像是壁畫上嵌金的雕飾。

sentences.english: The interior of the church is divided into 3 naves .
sentences.chinese: 堂內爲三通廊式，內牆彩繪壁畫，裝飾華麗。

sentences.english: The ceiling is painted with frescos, among which the four larger-sized depict the ecumenical councils.
sentences.chinese: 屋頂繪滿壁畫，較大四幅描繪了教會會議的情景。

sentences.english: In the Dunhuang mural paintings, there exists a great amount of information about coloring practices during and before Tang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌的壁畫保存了大量唐及唐以前的繪畫設色資料。

definition: to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
